Articles.Content:
Hi, Is there any way to force complete a contract (which is a bugged BDB - I need to transmit science which I've already transmited with kerbalism) ?

When I go to cheat menu and complete the contract there, it will show up again in the mission control. I need it to complete so the next contract in the chain will show up.

51 minutes ago, Hrubec said:

When I go to cheat menu and complete the contract there, it will show up again in the mission control. I need it to complete so the next contract in the chain will show up. 

It really depends on what the requirements of the contract are. Sometimes simply completing it in the cheat menu doesn't also resolve how the contracts is called. 

What contract pack is it from? 

Edited December 13, 2022 by Caerfinon

It's BDB, but I also noticed it for kerbalism contract - stay 30 days in orbit with crew. This one also didn't get completed when I reached more than 30 days with crew. When I completed it via the cheat menu, the contract reappeared in the mission control as available. 

Is there a way how to mark the contract as completed in the save file?

7 minutes ago, Hrubec said:

stay 30 days in orbit with crew

did you switch to the vessel to complete the contract? Sometimes Contract Configurator timers loose track of where they are but switching to the ship after the timer expires usually corrects this. 

10 minutes ago, Hrubec said:

Is there a way how to mark the contract as completed in the save file? 

In the save file you can look for the active contracts and edit them complete, but that's also what the cheat menu does.
